code: import React from'react';import{CheckCircleIcon,XCircleIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BackendStatus=_ref=>{let{health}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-slate-800/50 border-b border-slate-700 px-4 py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2",children:[health.production?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-green-400"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XCircleIcon,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-red-400"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm text-slate-300",children:["Production:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:health.production?'text-green-400 ml-1':'text-red-400 ml-1',children:health.production?'Online':'Offline'})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2",children:[health.streaming?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-green-400"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XCircleIcon,{className:"h-4 w-4 text-red-400"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm text-slate-300",children:["Streaming:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:health.streaming?'text-green-400 ml-1':'text-red-400 ml-1',children:health.streaming?'Online':'Offline'})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hidden sm:block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-xs text-slate-400",children:["System Status:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:health.production&&health.streaming?'text-green-400 ml-1':health.production||health.streaming?'text-yellow-400 ml-1':'text-red-400 ml-1',children:health.production&&health.streaming?'All Systems Operational':health.production||health.streaming?'Partial Service':'Service Unavailable'})]})})]})});};export default BackendStatus;
